name: Truth or Dare Shoutout
description:
Truth or Dare Shoutout
Great family fun game for all ages.

How to play:
1) Add the players name
2) Shake your device and it will pick a player at random
3) Ask them truth or dare
4) Press the relevant button

Hours of fun for everyone

App features:
*Has lots of dares & truth questions
*Can add unto 8 players
*Shake your iPhone to pick a player
*Can set a timer
*Can change the timer seconds to give them more time
*Can share the truth or dares on Facebook & twitter

For more great apps check out our website or follow us on twitter or facebook.
